application-form-type.required: Select how would you like to apply

licensee-type.required: Select what type of licensee are you

company-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
company-name.maxlength: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters
company-name.minlength: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters

company-number.companyNumber: Enter a real company number, like 16850062

telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

website-url.maxlength: Website URL must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters

is-premises-address-same.required: Select if your contact details are the same for your licence and business address

premises-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters

premises-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

person-in-charge-full-name.required: Enter the name of the person in charge
person-in-charge-full-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
person-in-charge-full-name.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
person-in-charge-full-name.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

person-in-charge-email-address.required: Enter an email address for the person in charge

person-in-charge-confirmed-dbs.required: You must confirm this person has applied for or currently holds a DBS certificate

person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.required: Enter the name on the person in charge's DBS application
person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.maxlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters
person-in-charge-dbs-fullname.minlength: Full name must be between 3 and 200 characters

person-in-charge-dbs-reference.minlength: DBS reference must be between 3 and 25 characters
person-in-charge-dbs-reference.alphanum: Enter a real DBS certificate number or application reference number

person-in-charge-dbs-date-of-issue.date: Enter a real date of issue or application
person-in-charge-dbs-date-of-issue.before: DBS date of issue or application must not be in the future
person-in-charge-dbs-date-of-issue.after: DBS certificates cannot be more than 3 years old. This person must apply for a new DBS certificate

person-in-charge-dbs-subscription.required: Select if the person in charge has subscribed to DBS updates

member-of-professional-body.required: Select if anyone on this application is a member of a professional body

professional-body-details.required: Enter details of the professional bodies and any relevant reference numbers
professional-body-details.maxlength: Details of professional bodies must be less than 2,000 characters
professional-body-details.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links

file-upload.unsaved: The selected file was not uploaded – try again
